mapper.insert: insert into users(user_name, user_email, user_pw, seller_level_id) values(#{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_pw}, #{seller_level_id})
mapper.select: select nvl(user_email,0) USER_EMAIL from( select * from users where user_email=#{user_email1}) right outer join dual on user_email = #{user_email2}

select b.bids_order_number, b.bids_order_state_idx, i.img_product_idx, i.img_file, i.img_realfile, b.bids_size_idx, b.bids_price from bids b join images i ON b.bids_product_id = i.img_product_idx where b.bids_user_email = #{id} AND i.img_repthumb = #{img_repthumb} order by b.bids_idx desc

select a.asks_order_state_idx, i.img_product_idx, i.img_file, i.img_realfile, a.asks_size_idx, a.asks_price from asks a join images i ON a.asks_product_id = i.img_product_idx where a.asks_user_email = #{id} AND i.img_repthumb =#{img_repthumb} order by a.asks_idx desc
